001package org.hd.d.TRVmodel.hg;
002
003import java.util.List;
004import java.util.Objects;
005
006import org.hd.d.TRVmodel.data.DDNTemperatureDataCSV;
007import org.hd.d.TRVmodel.hg.HGTRVHPMModelParameterised.DemandWithoutAndWithSetback;
008import org.hd.d.TRVmodel.hg.HGTRVHPMModelParameterised.HeatAndElectricityDemand;
009
010/**Drives the parameterised HG model variant(s) with hourly external temperature data.
011 * This clones the model parameters, replacing the external temperature for each hour.
012 *
013 * @param modelParameters  input parameters to the model; never null
014 * @param temperatures  hourly temperature records; never null nor empty
015 */
016public record HGTRVHPMModelByHour(HGTRVHPMModelParameterised.ModelParameters modelParameters, DDNTemperatureDataCSV temperatures)
017        {
018        public HGTRVHPMModelByHour
019                {
020                Objects.requireNonNull(modelParameters);
021                Objects.requireNonNull(temperatures);
022                if(temperatures.data().isEmpty()) { throw new IllegalArgumentException(); }
023                }
024
025        /**Temperature below which space heating is required, CIBSE typical UK threshold. */
026        public static final double DEFAULT_BASE_HEATING_TEMPERATURE_C = 15.5;
027
028        /**Results of running a model against a temperature set.
029         * @param  hoursFractionSetbackRaisesDemand  fraction of the hours in which setting back B rooms
030         *     causes electricity demand by the heat pump to rise [0.0,1.0]
031         * @param demand heat and electrical mean demand; not null
032         */
033        public record ScenarioResult(double hoursFractionSetbackRaisesDemand, DemandWithoutAndWithSetback demand)
034                {
035                public ScenarioResult
036                        {
037                        if(!Double.isFinite(hoursFractionSetbackRaisesDemand)) { throw new IllegalArgumentException(); }
038                        if(hoursFractionSetbackRaisesDemand < 0) { throw new IllegalArgumentException(); }
039                        if(hoursFractionSetbackRaisesDemand > 1) { throw new IllegalArgumentException(); }
040                        Objects.requireNonNull(demand);
041                        }
042                }
043
044        /**Run scenario on model and temperature data; never null.
045         * @param modelDetached  iff true, model detached house
046         *     (else model original 4-room bungalow)
047         * @param softATemp  iff true run with soft temperature regulation
048         *     (pure weather compensation) in A rooms,
049         *     else run with original 'still' regulation
050     * @param equilibriumTemperatureMin  if not null and not zero length,
051     *     used to return the minimum A-room equilibrium temperature
052         */
053        public ScenarioResult runScenario(final boolean modelDetached,
054                        final boolean softATemp,
055                        final double[] equilibriumTemperatureMin)
056                {
057                final int hourCount = temperatures.data().size();
058//              assert(hourCount > 0);
059
060                // Running totals.
061                int hoursSetbackRaisesDemand = 0;
062                // Cumulative Wh.
063                double heatDemandNSB = 0;
064                double heatPumpElectricityNSB = 0;
065                double heatDemandSB = 0;
066                double heatPumpElectricitySB = 0;
067
068                if(null != equilibriumTemperatureMin)
069                    { equilibriumTemperatureMin[0] = HGTRVHPMModel.NORMAL_ROOM_TEMPERATURE_C; }
070                final double equilibriumTemperature[] = new double[1];
071
072                for(final List<String> row : temperatures.data())
073                        {
074                        final double temperature = Double.parseDouble(row.get(DDNTemperatureDataCSV.INDEX_OF_TEMPERATURE));
075
076                        // Assume no heat required above standard HDD base temperature.
077                        if(temperature >= DEFAULT_BASE_HEATING_TEMPERATURE_C) { continue; }
078
079                        final HGTRVHPMModelParameterised.ModelParameters updateModelParameters =
080                                        modelParameters.cloneWithAdjustedExternalTemperature(temperature);
081
082                    equilibriumTemperature[0] = HGTRVHPMModel.NORMAL_ROOM_TEMPERATURE_C;
083                final DemandWithoutAndWithSetback power = softATemp ?
084                                HGTRVHPMModelParameterised.computeSoftATempDemandW(updateModelParameters, !modelDetached, equilibriumTemperature) :
085                        HGTRVHPMModelParameterised.computeDetachedDemandW(updateModelParameters, !modelDetached);
086                        if((null != equilibriumTemperatureMin) &&
087                                        (equilibriumTemperature[0] < equilibriumTemperatureMin[0]))
088                                { equilibriumTemperatureMin[0] = equilibriumTemperature[0]; }
089
090                heatDemandNSB += power.noSetback().heatDemand();
091                heatPumpElectricityNSB += power.noSetback().heatPumpElectricity();
092
093                heatDemandSB += power.withSetback().heatDemand();
094                heatPumpElectricitySB += power.withSetback().heatPumpElectricity();
095
096            if(power.withSetback().heatPumpElectricity() > power.noSetback().heatPumpElectricity())
097                { ++hoursSetbackRaisesDemand; }
098                        }
099
100                final double hoursFractionSetbackRaisesDemand = hoursSetbackRaisesDemand / (double) hourCount;
101
102                final DemandWithoutAndWithSetback demand = new DemandWithoutAndWithSetback(
103                        new HeatAndElectricityDemand(heatDemandNSB / hourCount, heatPumpElectricityNSB / hourCount),
104                        new HeatAndElectricityDemand(heatDemandSB / hourCount, heatPumpElectricitySB / hourCount));
105
106                return(new ScenarioResult(hoursFractionSetbackRaisesDemand, demand));
107                }
108        }
